titleStmt.title: Fair warning to take heed of popery, or, A short and true history of the Jesuits fiery practices and powder-plots, to destroy kings, ruin kingdoms, and lay cities waste by an Anti-Papist.
titleStmt.author: Anti-Papist.
Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing (2nd ed.) to John Bramhall.
Wing gives publication date 1674; date on t.p. has number 9 written over final digit of date, with "4?" written beside.
Errors in paging: p. 56, 84, and 135 numbered 46, 74, and 153 respectively.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
